meanings.definition: Not conforming to the standards of a profession.
meanings.sent1: Her behavior at the meeting was unprofessional.
meanings.sent2: It is unprofessional to arrive late for work.
meanings.sent3: The clown's unprofessional antics made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His unprofessional conduct painted a negative image of him.
meanings.sent5: The unprofessional attire stood out in the formal event.

meanings.definition: Not exhibiting the qualities expected in a professional setting.
meanings.sent2: She was reprimanded for her unprofessional attitude.
meanings.sent3: The unprofessional chef accidentally added sugar instead of salt.
meanings.sent4: The unprofessional performance left the audience disappointed.
meanings.sent5: His unprofessional behavior cost him the job opportunity.
